QuestData.Title: Body
QuestData.Description: A brew's body is an important and often overlooked factor.$B$BTo create the perfect consistency, I will need pristine eyes from the Bog Crocolisks to the east.$B$BTake care. The creatures are quite vicious.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Pristine Crocolisk Eyes from Bog Crocolisks.
QuestData.CompletionText: Watch your step in the swamp, my new friend.
QuestData.RewardText: Do you have crocolisks where you are from?
